thread.title: Has PM Modi set the bridal fashion trend? | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Has PM Modi set the bridal fashion trend? | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Has PM Modi set the bridal fashion trend? | Deccan Chronicle
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 19, 2015, 23.51 pm Sabyasachi As the wedding season approaches, designer to Bollywood biggies, Sabyasachi is back to helping some brides to be look their stunning best with another season of Band Bajaa Bride on television. This time though, along with the brides, there’s a makeover in store for grooms too. Speaking about the thought behind the idea, the designer tells us, “A bride alone cannot complete the picture. When people post wedding pics on social media, both the bride and grooms outfits are equally noticed which is why we are working with couples this season.”
Sharing some tips for brides to be this season, Sabya tells us, “Going traditional is big this season. I think its also because PM Modi has been promoting Indian culture so much. Strong shades of red are back as a favourite for brides. This can be teamed with traditional jewelry.”
